title: Unable to Launch Legacy client after Patching to 7.1
body:
Ever since I patched to 7.1  I have been unable to launch the Legacy client. When I attempt to launch it, I receive the following popup shown below. I assume that deleting league, then just reinstalling it would solve the issue, but I'm afraid to because I remember Riot saying  something along the lines that that uninstalling the Alpha file would not be good. Would appreciate any assistance.

http://prntscr.com/dux46i

replies.body: This error is usually a result of security settings blocking the patcher from launching or scanning files.  Reinstalling would not solve restore that access.  Instead, you'll want to follow the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to fix this up.  Let me know if that clears things up!
That seems to have worked, thanks.
